briefdescription.para: Sends startup packets to the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if sending the startup packets was successful.
Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the MCU by initializing all variables and then sending startup packets to the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if sending the startup packets was successful.

briefdescription.para: Respond to a Startup packet sent from the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if the packet was handled successfully.
Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.
bool - TRUE if the packet was programmed successfully.
bool - TRUE if the packet was read successfully.

briefdescription.para: Respond to packets sent from the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if the packet was handled successfully.
Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.

briefdescription.para: Respond to packets sent from the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if the packet was handled successfully.
Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.

briefdescription.para: Respond to packets sent from the PC.

simplesect.para: bool - TRUE if the packet was handled successfully.
Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.

briefdescription.para: Respond to packets sent from the PC.

simplesect.para: Assumes that MCUInit has been called successfully.

briefdescription.para: Main module. This module implements serial port (USB) communications with a PC. The Simple Serial Communication Protocol is used. The command handlers for a several commands (defined in the protocol) are implemented.
